goals.active: Help the kodan destroy the horn.
goals.complete: I decided that Romke's horn was too corrupted and must be destroyed. The kodan had a way to rip out the horn's power, but the horn summoned terrifying creatures to defend itself. In the end, we prevailed. I hated to lose this heirloom from my ancestor, but now the Sons of Svanir can no longer use it for darkness.
